ygData.subject: Harmonic is a Slacker (was:Re: Re:Re: Guise of the Deceiver (Longish))

ygData.messageBody:
>From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
> Last I can recall, these are my stats (of well roundedness)
> No gloating, just fyi junk...
>
> smithing, 90.
> fletching, 103.
> swimming, 180 something?
> baking, 82.
> brewing, 146. bleeding brains still increase this.
> pottery, 135? prepatch, however lined vials still increase it.
> beg, 21? hehe...
> tailoring, 23! woohoo.
> fishing, 125.
>
Geez Harmonic you sure are a slacking, powergamer :p
Try these:
Smithing, 175
Fletching, 102
Swimming, 175
Baking, 142
Brewing, 168
Pottery, 150
Beg, 35
Tailoring, 90
Fishing, 105
Jewel Craft, 107
Instill Doubt, 98
All languages to excellent except Gnoll, Goblin, Orcish, Lizardman, Faerie

Now get back to work!

Rokenn Swifsong - The well rounded bard of Karana :)
